select ci.id, ci.course_name, ci.content, ci.code, ci.teacher_id, ci.create_date, ti.code as teacherCode, ti.name as teacherName, ti.images, ti.phone from course_info ci left join teacher_info ti on (ti.id = ci.teacher_id) where 1 = 1
AND ci.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseInfo.courseName},'%')
AND ci.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseInfo.code},'%')
AND ti.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseInfo.teacherName},'%')
AND ti.user_id = #{courseInfo.teacherId}
order by ci.create_date desc
